Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server

Class ServerView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observable<ClientEvent>
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.ServerView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<ServerEvent>
public class ServerView
extends Observable<ClientEvent>
implements Observer<ServerEvent>
Class with a role similar to a proxy that speaks to the client sending events

      GameSetupEvent communicates to the client the choices of the other players.
      Parameters:
      players - Players' username
      colors - Players's colors (automatically set)
      divinities - Players' chosen divinity
      descriptions - Description of the divinities' powers

      Sends a InvalidMoveEvent communicating a bad move and sends again parameters
      Parameters:
      possileActions - Old list of possible actions
      wrongX - Wrong x coordinate chosen by the player
      wrongY - Wrong y coordinate chosen by the player

      public void invalidWorkerSelection​(int x, int y)

      Parameters:
      x - x tile of the blocked worker
      y - y tile of the blocked worker

      public void stopPing()
